landing.heroSubtitle: Track and monitor your deployment pipeline with a playful visualization.
landing.buildDescription: Track code build status in real time
landing.deployDescription: Experience the deployment process as a game
landing.footerNote: Monitor pipeline status in real time and experience success or failure through gameplay.
landing.ctaDescription: Jump into the game or read the documentation to learn how Deploy Land works.

modal.title: CI/CD Status API
modal.description: Detailed information for the pipeline status REST endpoint.
modal.successDescription: When a valid pipelineId exists in DynamoDB, the endpoint returns the pipeline's current status, full job list, and total job count as JSON.
modal.successItem2: Detailed state, order, and metadata of each job
modal.successItem3: Total number of jobs and completion rate
modal.failureDescription: If the path parameter pipelineId is missing, the following JSON error is returned.
